```{python}
#| label: fig-polar
#| fig-cap: "a line plot"

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fix, ax = plt.subplots(
     subplot_kw = {'projection': "polar"}
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
